phone_start.text: As you pick up the handset and put it to your ear, you hear a woman's voice on the other end. "Hello?"

phone_branch_1.select_text: "Hello, this is the office of William Steward, private detective. How can I help?"
phone_branch_1.text:
The woman hurriedly responds, "This is Jane Evans, I scheduled a consultation with you yesterday, my apologies for not being able to come in person."
Considering your rather bedraggled form, you quietly think that not being seen is for the better.

phone_branch_1_1.select_text: "Not a problem, Miss Evans. Now what did you need consulting about?"
phone_branch_1_1.text: "There's been a break-in at one of my employer's office branches nearby," she says, "and you're wanted to investigate."

phone_branch_1_1_1.text: The voice responds "Oh, I thought you knew! My employer is McMiller Shipping International."

phone_branch_1_1_2.select_text: "Why are you not going to the police for this?"
phone_branch_1_1_2.text: "We'd like to keep this quiet if possible. Having the police look through our building doesn't give the best of looks," the woman answers, curtly.

phone_branch_1_1_3.select_text: "What are the details of this break-in?"
phone_branch_1_1_3.text: "I'm not allowed to go over all the details until you agree to investigate. However, what I can tell you is that it seems to have been a fairly benign burglary and nothing of extreme value was stolen."

phone_branch_1_1_3_1.text:
"As I said, I cannot tell you more unless you agree to take on the case," she says tersely, "and if you will not do it, I will find someone else."
Looking around your battered room, you think that you could quite use the money, even if there's certainly something... off, about all of this.

phone_branch_1_1_4.select_text: "Are you willing to pay my regular rate?"
phone_branch_1_1_4.text:
"Of course, detective. I have additionally been authorized to pay an extra twenty percent to ensure your discretion during and after the case."
You crack a thin smile. Discretion hasn't always been your strong suit, but you think you can manage for this kind of pay.

phone_branch_1_1_5.select_text: "I would be quite willing to take this case, Miss."
phone_branch_1_1_5.text: "Excellent," the telephone states matter-of-factly, "I knew you would agree. The office that was broken into isn't far from yours; find it on the corner of 82nd and 3rd." The woman hangs up, leaving you with little but a promise and the low hum of a dial tone.

phone_branch_1_1_5_1.text: As those words echo in your empty, time-worn office, you get a feeling this won't be just a regular burglary.
